website_summaries.verdict: Durable and practical, this bow and arrow set makes its user a formidable opponent in any Nerf skirmish, large or small.
pros: This Nerf bow and arrow set comes with a useful Nerf dart holder for quick reloading
Its self-contained trigger mechanism is also more durable than some of the other pull-string models available
cons: Some found that the darts don't fly as far as they do with other Nerf Rebelle models

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough how impressed I am with the Nerf Rebelle line of products! They make fun family toys. I have no complaints about anything regarding this bow. It is crafted well and feels very durable. It is a nice girly version of something typically marketed towards boys. I like the dart holder too! The one on the Nerf Rebelle Blaster is not as functional and practical as this bow has. I'm pleased to see that the darts fit in nicely, don't fall out, and are not deformed in any way. Very nice product! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: LeiyahElamadri

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy Nerf bow perfect for your daughter
customer_reviews.text: As is typical of Nerf's line of dart guns, the Heartbreaker Bow is sturdily constructed and fairly easy to use. My girls (ages four and seven) can't fire the dart its maximum distance with every pull of the string -- some come out as duds -- but they are able to send enough darts soaring across my backyard that they enjoy playing with the bow. The bow only comes with five darts, and they travel far enough that they can be easy to lose, get stuck in a tree, etc. Plan on buying a refill pack of darts to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: RBT

customer_reviews.title: The girls enjoyed playing with the 1 out of 2 that arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: The girls enjoyed playing with the 1 out of 2 that arrived unbroken from the manufacturer. The broken one arrived with both strings broken. So much for quality control. Also makes me wonder how long the one remaining bow will last if the string is that easily snapped. They do not shoot the darts 75 feet even with an adult doing it. They maybe go about 20 feet. They aren't that sturdy so I don't expect it to last throughout the year. I would have given it 2 stars if the girls didn't like playing with the one bow.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and it is addictive!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 yr old daughter for Christmas. This was a big hit. Very easy to use. It is a little trickier to hit a target than a typical nerf "gun"--shooting a bow requires a steadier hand. We have all enjoyed it--my husband and I and our 8 and 10 year old daughters. The only one who hasn't enjoyed it is our 5 year old--you have to put a little muscle into pulling back the string and she just can't pull it out far enough to make the dart go very far. Great little toy and the dart holder makes it easy to keep track of the darts.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky Scribe

customer_reviews.title: The pull is easy until the last couple of inches
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3 year old so she could play nerd with her big brother. I thought she would be able to manipulate the bow, but it took a bit of practice. The pull is easy until the last couple of inches. Unfortunately the last few inches is what you need to shoot the dart. It's such a difference that it took me a few tries to figure it out. I thought I was going to break it before I realized it needed more force. Once we discovered that it worked great. I do wish it came with more darts. Only comes with 4 or 5.
customer_reviews.author: RamZ81

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our warrior princess
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter's 10th birthday and it was a big hit! She said it was her favorite gift. It only took her a few minutes to get the hang of it. It really shoots the Nerf darts quite far...at least 30 feet and more. The darts are small so think twice about shooting them on the lawn unless it's been recently mowed. Our 4 year old granddaughter also loved it. She was strong enough to pull and shoot it almost as far as the 10 year old. Guess we'll be ordering another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift for girls. . .
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that the design is amazing! This is not your average girly looking bow. Nerf did great designing these Rebelle products for girls! We bought two different designs for Christmas for our just turned 7-year-old and 9-year-old daughters. To get the distance, you have to have your bow pulled STRAIGHT back. Our younger daughter keeps pulling the handle just a little bit too high, but she can still shoot it. This is a great gift for our Katniss Everdeen loving children! Way to go Nerf on an awesome girl gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for my Little Hunter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in October for my niece's birthday this month. One of the bloggers that I follow let us know when it was $15 so I scooped it up ASAP. I see now that it is $44, I am so glad I got it when I did! I gave it to her tonight and she LOVED IT! She has 3 brothers and they even thought this was an awesome gift! At first she had a hard time getting the darts to shoot, but once she figured out that the little green thing attached to the string has to be showing before you release the string she was firing away! Definitely worth what I spent!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls.. but the "arrow" situation sucks!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My daughter loves hers the only downside is that you only get a handful of the "designer arrows" which are just silk screened and colored pretty but they are the same foam. These arrows to replace are EXPENSIVE! Its a ripoff and my daughter got so upset because I didnt get her the colorful ones. I ended up using a permanent marker on some and paint pens and I even used washi tape (WAY CHEAPER and more styles can be made that way)
customer_reviews.author: coupleofnerds

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Wimpy for a nerf product
customer_reviews.text: My family loves Nerf products! We have nightly battles with our Nerf N-Strike guns. When Santa delivered this bow our daughter was thrilled, until she shot it. It says has a range of 75 feet, but neither my husband or myself could get it to go that far. With my 10yr old shooting it the darts barely make it the 80 inches across our sofa! We will be heading to Academy sports to buy the Nerf type crossbow her brother got! We were disappointed in this Nerf Rebelle product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Rebelle Bow- a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had seen some kids playing with nerf guns and thought they looked like fun. So I got this bow for my daughter. She thought it was cool and was pretty quickly into it. But the thing is cheaply made, only fires the darts occasionally, and was quickly put aside for a more reliable toy. I have seen other kids pick up the bow, try it and pretty quickly put it down in frustration. It just doesn't work. I'd say this is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: musicway

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty, sissy bow. Did I say it was pretty. This bow works, but it's so not going to break a nail! The projectile doesn't travel 5 feet and it sure the heck isn't going to hurt or scare anything. If youre up against the "boy" versions of a nerf bow or other shooting apparatus take cover! Youre going to have to wait till your opponent runs out of amo then throw your whole bow at their head and run away screaming. Did I say it was pretty.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the rebelle line
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this purchase. I didn't find it worth it with other nerf purchases but after researching it and physically seeing I bought it. I doubt it could go 75 ft unless u modify the nerf 'arrows'. However, to pull back properly u do have to use a proper bow hold and shoot. This product proves to be durable And fun which is definitely an upgrade from my previous dealings with nerf. What's better is that the same quality extended to the whole rebelle line. I bought our littlest the mini rebelle nerf shooters and the middle one the crossbow which is great. Bravo nerf on this line.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Not really a fan
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy isn't all that good with this and oddly enough I can shoot it better than any of the guys can. The power in the shot isn't consistent at all, even when used the same way consistently. If it were easier to return online items, then I would be returning it, but instead it is being used as a prop for the type of nerf weapon we don't allow at our LARP game. (We don't allow anything that requires strings to fire)
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: at first I thought it was a bust!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter opened this on Christmas morning and upon her first tries, it wouldn't shoot. So I gave it a shot and it didn't work for me either. I was so impressed with Nerf for making a line for girls, and as I was getting frustrated that we got a dud, I pulled back harder and it fired! So my message is, if it doesn't work, pull harder! Lots of fun and perfectly designed for a girl of any age.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow (Phoenix Design)
customer_reviews.text: My five year old grand daughter loves this toy. It looks well made and I am hoping will last a long time. When the string is pulled properly, the "arrow" flies a satisfying distance. Otherwise, it sort of drops forwards a few inches. She uses it indoors, but I must add there aren't many breakable objects in her house that could be broken from a misdirected shot.
customer_reviews.author: Rose W.

customer_reviews.title: Cool.  Was the hit of the party.
customer_reviews.text: The 10 year old daughter of my friend loved it. Her eyes lit up as she opened the package. It works well though has a short learning curve. She had trouble at first but the adults around tried it out and gave her some instruction. It was fun for this adult to shoot also. With the right shot these things can go pretty far. The darts are very soft and it would be hard to hurt someone or something with this cool toy
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Snell

customer_reviews.title: Nerf for Girls
customer_reviews.text: Since the whole Hunger Games, this has been the staple (Nerf for girls). My daughter is 5, and she finally got the hang of it after shooting it for about 20 minutes. We setup an archery target set of boxes, and she has been having a blast. It is built very well, and the only thing I could find rough, is if you lose the darts. For that, we make sure we only shoot it in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery W Trask

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little archer.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my tiny (she still wears 4T) 7 year old daughter, with some aprehension. I was afraid that it would be too big for her, and she would not be able to use it. I was wrong!!! She loves it!! It is the perfect size for her, but not too small for her older sister to use. My 4 year old does have some trouble pulling back to release the arrows, but she has the Blaster for "protection"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy cord on bow will break down and fall apart if left out in sun
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. My 8 year old really enjoyed using it around the backyard. Doesn't take too much steength to pull it back, and the distance the darts travel is impressive when aimed right. DO NOT leave this sitting out in the sun, as it will warp and deteriorate the stretchy cord on the bow, which will cause it to break and be useless.
customer_reviews.author: Keri A.

customer_reviews.title: but I think suction cup arrows as an option to buy as a refill would be good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this bow. She takes it with her everywhere. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the arrows don't have suction cups, and the suction cup nerf tips don't work with it. So, when shooting it at windows and around the house, they tend to get caught under couches instead of sticking to the windows. A small price to pay, I know, but I think suction cup arrows as an option to buy as a refill would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for my daughter for Christmas so that she could play with a friend at the same time. One of them broke within a week and the second about two weeks later. They were not being treated poorly and my daughter was in tears over losing out on her Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rcard

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this for christmas along with a real bow. It doesnt come with many darts and the replacements are alot higher since they are girly colored and not the regular yellow, although those would work too. She has been able to shoot about ten feet with it, and caused her older bother to yelp when hit close range with it. Overall shes pleased.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Does not hurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bow to add to my collection. There are a few cons. First they should offer this bow in black and camouflage. Second it bounced off the deer even though it was a direct hit, no nearly enough power. My friends all laughed at me so I gave the 2 bows I purchased to my 6 year old daughters, they love them.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing performance
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this product the quality is excellent but it did not perform well at all. It did not shoot the foam bullets out very well. Very disappointing. However we did buy the Nerf rebel gun which works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mulhern

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this bow and "arrow" set!
customer_reviews.text: These bows are all the rage right now with young girls. They play like they are Katniss Everdeen from the Hunger Games. And I don't have to worry about my things getting broken or anyone hurting themselves because the arrows are the Nerf suction cup "bullets" that you use with all the Nerf guns. Such a cute idea for the girls!
customer_reviews.author: Nixon72

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Nerf gun for each of my family members (Me, my husband, and my 3 girls) and extra ammo so we could have a Nerf War. It was SO much fun! I need to get some more guns and ammo so I can beat my husband.. If you haven't had a Nerf Gun fight with your family, you're missing out.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and good quality from what I can tell
customer_reviews.text: I got this bow in the vine design as well for two of my girls and they are loving them! They're so fun! They've been playing with them a ton! Good quality, I got the extra bullets and I'm glad, my kids tend to shoot and look later :) I love that my kids actually have to try to pull it back far enough similar to what would happen on a real bow and arrow, but without damaging arrows and heavy hitting power behind every shot.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Doesn't Shoot Far
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty to look at, cute fun colors & designs, but they're crummy when it comes down to actually playing with it, it's lame. It's actually kind of funny to watch how the little darts go about 3 feet & plop to the floor, it's just so crummy it's humorous. You're better off buying the bow they make for boys, they're much sturdier & the arrows/darts, fly waaaay further. My Daughter is quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine Burney

customer_reviews.title: Good girl gun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can launch the included darts quite a way! Got it for a 5 year old and she had no trouble picking it up and using it without someone showing her how really. The Rebelle Bow also uses regular Nerf darts if anyone is interested in that information (but the darts that come with it are very pretty!)
customer_reviews.author: Stuffy

customer_reviews.title: but we are all disappointed in overall performance
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointing. It doesn't have much "power" behind the dart. My daughter likes the idea, but we are all disappointed in overall performance. Probably would have chosen something else if we had known about the low quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Daislilly

customer_reviews.title: Was a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece. At first I thought it was broken until we found that you have to pull back pretty hard to engage the shooting mechanism. Once we figured this out, it worked great. She will have a lot of fun with this. Paid her another $10 to target her mother as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: bwan

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: When my granddaughter opened this she said "oh wow" and was all smiles. I got one for her sister also and they were shooting it right away which mom and dad did not approve. But they took them to a different part of the house. I also got them a target to shoot instead of people. That worked a little bit. Kids will be kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as part of my daughters birthday gifts, she really was excited when she got it but it turn out to be a really Big disappointment when she tried to use it, simple didn't work. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SAIZKA

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my 10 year old Daughter really wanted it for Xmas. My 13 year old Daughter did not. It was so much fun that the 13 year old used her own money and bought the blue one for herself! 50 year old Mom bought the purple one! We had a lot of fun! Especially after we didn't have to share the original one anymore. I think it's awesome that the toy makers are finally realizing that girls like these type toys too but don't necessarily like the boy colors!
customer_reviews.author: MomfromMN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't shoot well
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter always plays nerf guns with the boys and it was nice to have a nerf toy that was girly!! The only problem with this is that it was the hype during Christmas, but it honestly doesn't shoot the bullet more than 10 feet. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Harshfield

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for my 7 year old to use. Have to pull back pretty hard to get it to shoot well. Most of the time it just goes 4 feet. Not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this item really bad but was disappointed when she first used it, not only is it not accurate but it's also hard to pull, cheaply made and does not aim correctly, the only thing we liked is the design but overall not worth the price we paid!
customer_reviews.author: Southwest mom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves this! Her favorite game with daddy is for him to shoot her with nerfs. We also use a white board and draw targets on it then use suction cup darts to shoot and keep score. Best idea for birthday present ever.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Tricky
customer_reviews.text: Hard to shoot far, but once you figure out to pull through the pull-back it goes pretty well, easily 20 ft or so. Fun for chasing other siblings around the house! Darts are a little flimsy, but that's probably better than "getting your eye" shot out... :)
customer_reviews.author: TMD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the girls who love Katniss!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is 11 just loves Katniss! This will be a great Christmas gift for her as she has already asked for it and doesn't have a clue that she will receive it!! Can't wait to see her expression!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Coley

customer_reviews.title: fun times!
customer_reviews.text: This bow does not shoot Nearly 75 feet its probably 30 feet most of the time but it is still a great toy. I found this for $17.99 on Amazon a dew weeks before Christmas and with prime it shipped free.. that was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: BridgieMae

customer_reviews.title: Easy shot at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 5 year old because it doesn't require cocking or pulling back to shoot the arrow. All other nerf guns do and they are too difficult even for our 8 yr old and they are frustrated. The now and arrows are a great start at an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: alisyn

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful or accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful or accurate. It seems to have an excess amount of materials for the job. Not accurate compared to other Nerf shooters I have used. I do not believe my daughter has not played with it at all since the day after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tambo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. We got 2 for our daughters for Christmas. So cute. Just make sure you PULL ALL THE WAY BACK until you see the the green pop out on the string. If you don't see the green, the dart will on go 3 or 4 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Velocity is Slow
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter loved this toy (10 years old), and that it has the added benefit of being tailored to a girls specifications and esthetic appeal, it lacks in being able to actually sling darts beyond a mere toss! It just lacks any real velocity.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin's Apprentice

customer_reviews.title: For the ruffians and dart fights in the house.  Guns are so 90's.
customer_reviews.text: After hunger games they all want bows but they can't draw yet. This is step one for muzzle control and basic archery stance. Soon little compound and target arrows. Got to start somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sobkowiak

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I think my daughter (8 year old) really loves this clearly Hunger Games inspired girly nerf bow and arrow. I have been shot countless times and it has not yet broken so good job nerf!!
customer_reviews.author: Garot M. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Got as gift for grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I got it for my grandaughter for chrsistmas and she barely got a chance to play with it all the adults were having too much fun with it. Great quality! Even the little arrows you shoot have great designs on them
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old is having great fun!
customer_reviews.text: She got two and brings out her inner Katniss regularly. Battles when friends come over, made her own target, and takes them where ever she thinks she'll find a worthy adversary. Adults often get in on the fun too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Not the Nerf quality expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy. However the draw back string is difficult to manuver. This is probably a better suit for teenage girls, not elementry aged. The quality of this product doesn't seem as good as the other Nerf toys. Honestly this Nerf bow seems cheaply made. I am disapointed with this products quality.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyBride

customer_reviews.title: Was broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and arrived broken. The bow string was broken when it was opened. No damage to the box. The child's father had to take it apart and re-string it.
customer_reviews.author: Loving The North

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her 8th birthday. She and my 6 year old son ran around all morning playing "The Hunger Games". At first they had trouble getting it to shoot and were getting frustrated, but once they mastered pulling it back far enough to see the green indicator they had a blast. My son is demanding I get him one. I asked if I could have a turn and didn't want to put it down. My husband enjoyed ambushing us throughout the afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves archery but tends to get couped up indoors in the winter due to illness or weather. She was excited to find this under the Christmas tree and drew herself a bull's eye to practice indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Scootermomma

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool.
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old daughter loves it. She has some trouble shooting it. If i shoot it the darts go about six to eight feet. Its pretty wimpy compared to the dart guns. But it looks pretty slick and she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: coffii_howz

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Of the line of Rebelle by Nerf, this is my least favorite of the toys. It does not shoot the darts very well or very far. It's slow to reload and fire again, and unless you get the string lined up just at the right point, it is very disappointing. The look is incredible. I like carrying it, but I don't use this one to fight in Nerf wars. It's just not a practical toy weapon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Box came completely destroyed...pretty hard to pull off as a "NEW" gift when the box has been through the ringer. Doesnt shoot darts worth a flip. Not completely for sure if we got a faulty product or the toy itself just isnt great.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyjordan2723

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea.
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea. Sometimes it doesn't fire when you snap it. I've read it could be difficult to draw, but my 6 year old daughter had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: For my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and her and her cousins play with it all the time. I showed them how to cut up cardboard and make stand up targets and they knock those suckers down all afternoon long. Buy extra foam darts. 12/22/14 Edit: Xmas is coming up and I bought a ton more of the foam darts as stocking stuffers. We still find the old ones under the furniture wehn we clean up. The bow itself is still getting played with and still in operating condition. I'd say it gets used 1-2 times per month when the young cousins come over and play with our kid or she watches them (our kid being 13). Pretty durable for a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Martin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved this until the "string" dry rotted and snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is not what you think!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. We have several other Nerf Rebelle products and this one is by far the worst. When you draw back the the bow, you must do so until a green dot is demonstated. This is to indicate that you have pulled it back far enough to launch the arrow. It flies about 15 feet! A weak 15 feet at that! My daughter was looking for something resembling a real bow and arrow....this item is way off the mark!
customer_reviews.author: Mama of a Dinosaur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my granddaughter and she enjoys playing with her bow.
customer_reviews.author: Mary109

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The Rebelle bow works fine. The accuracy is lackluster and it feels like an item that won't last long. My young nieces, 5 and 6, had some trouble pulling the handle/string all the way back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: It's just Okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. My daughter liked it well enough, but the bow is mostly for show. The darts seem to be fired by a spring inside. It's slow to load and fires just one dart at a time. My daughter plays with her other Nerf guns much more because multiple darts can be loaded and fired quickly. We bought the iPod game attachment to go with this, but I don't think she ever used it.
customer_reviews.author: scott franklin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. At first it took some ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. At first it took some getting used to. The darts wouldn't fly very far. Once she got the hang of it, the darts started flying further.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Nerf doesn't disapoint. This was purchased as a gift for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it! It has been used a lot over the past few weeks and has held up great. I can see it eventually breaking, but we will probably purchase a replacement, she likes it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R Koepke

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. Delivery on time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: This is a real cool toy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to our niece for Christmas, she is 8 years old. She loves it, and so does her Dad. No problems for her to pull the string back, and she laughs and laughs as she shoots it.
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: Nerf'd
customer_reviews.text: The Nerf Bow isn't to the quality of some of the guns. My daughter loves it though. The issue she has is that the darts get stuck because it has to be pulled back juuuust right.
customer_reviews.author: TropicalPenguin

customer_reviews.title: niece was very excited
customer_reviews.text: young girl wanted this badly for Xmas. was very excited to open it. after we unpacked it, we found it a little hard to get to work right...the velocity it shot with was pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Farley

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 8 year old Granddaughter for Christmas. She asked for it, but didn't really like it. Bow broke almost right away. They were so hard to get at Christmas time that I paid way too much for it. Maybe good for child a little older. In my case it did not pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: Shopit

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Rebelle  Heartbreaker Bow  (Phoenix Design)
customer_reviews.text: Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow (Phoenix Design), excellent gift for a young child. It is safe, quality is good. Shipped on time, nice packaging, riced right. Purchased as a gift, more than satisfied with my purchase and seller. Lainiep12
customer_reviews.author: Lainiep12

customer_reviews.title: Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. Not only does she love it but our whole family loves it. I had her teaching me how to shoot it and we were pros in a matter of minutes. Product was received by the estimated time of arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Bow
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received the Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow as an early Christmas present. She loves it. Happy granddaughter, happy grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: evie Porter

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my granddaughters. It is what they wanted and I have no idea how it works or what it does. They seemed to enjoy it though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: String that connects the handle to the bow snaps easily; used only a couple times and the toy ...
customer_reviews.text: String that connects the handle to the bow snaps easily; used only a couple times and the toy is already rendered useless. I did manage to tear it apart and reconnect temporarily but it has already come apart again. It was good while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dena F

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a nine-year old girl
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a huge hit with our 9 year old. You do need to be able to pull back with a fair amount of force. I would say a young child - 4 or 5 - might not get so much enjoyment out of it. At first, we thought it wasn't working properly because we would pull back and release and the dart would only travel a very short distance. But then we realized we just hadn't pull back that extra bit. When we did that, those darts really flew a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Letcher

customer_reviews.title: twin warriors
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 year old twins that LOVE this!!! They have many adventures and actually play together wonderfully now! :) One of the best purchases I've made for them. They are now warriors! lol
customer_reviews.author: scubagal

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an eight year old and the brother and sister of a younger age enjoyed playing with it also. It was fun watching the kids faces light up when they saw it.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Good little toy
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting a real crossbow this is not for you. Does work well and the girls are excited with it. I have also ordered a real youth size compound bow so I can teach my daughter how to shoot. Shipping was fine
customer_reviews.author: Donald Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Now she can shoot like her and it is pink
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Nerf guns and she really likes Merida. Now she can shoot like her and it is pink, but no weapons on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter has had a lot of fun with this. The toy itself is pretty rugged and I anticipate that it will last (without breaking) for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for our daughters friend. She loved it and we loved how nice the price was. It was sent in a timely manner and works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: mrsspendstomuch

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: is not as fun as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does not fire well
customer_reviews.text: I like it cause my kids like it. But it really isn't as powerful as the other nerf rebelle toys. Does not fire very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch and Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered.  Packaging in perfect condition when arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Received this and packaging in great shape and looks perfect and fun! Great 1st bow! Got extra "arrows" too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Little girl happy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy to receive this as she was wanting one for Christmas. A little bit of a downer that it didn't shoot as far as she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully machined
customer_reviews.text: This is a much nice product than I expected. We purchased it for another person and had our doubts. I'm pleased with the quality and overall appearance of the bow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Otrugman

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift made a happy little girl
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter I can tell you I was the most popular santaclaus. She had ask for that, so I could not do a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift -- Especially if they aren't your kids!
customer_reviews.text: The bow worked really great and my niece loved it. She soon became the terror of the house with it in fact....and it packs a punch!
customer_reviews.author: lamnoiuio

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Not as fun as it appeared on the commercial. Darts were lost in the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen L

customer_reviews.title: thinks it's beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for her 8 th birthday. She absolutely loves it, thinks it's beautiful and easy to use. Her friends were jealous.
customer_reviews.author: keas mom

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 7 and 8 1/2 year old girls. They love the girly look to it and they love to go to war against their brothers. It hold 5 darts which is convenient. The release takes a little practice, but now they use it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L Reinhold-smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she is having so much fun with it! Very safe and very up to date with the Hunger Games!
customer_reviews.author: Florida girl

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for xmas and loves it. Its a great gift for any of the young princesses that are infatuated with Brave
customer_reviews.author: Mat N

customer_reviews.title: Heartbreaker Bow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. She has enjoyed every minute of it. The Nerf arrows are great as they do not pose a danger to her or those around.
customer_reviews.author: pop8

customer_reviews.title: Great Nerf for a Girl
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a Nerf so she could play with the boys. This "fit the bill!" Make sure to get some extra darts.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids liked to play with it, but did not come with enough projectiles.
customer_reviews.author: ROYCE BROWNFIELD

customer_reviews.title: great bow practice
customer_reviews.text: Fun product... Really need to teach a 10 or younger child how to handle it before letting them loose with it. But great fun alltogether!
customer_reviews.author: babydoll07

customer_reviews.title: I bought this last year, not expecting it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year,not expecting it to last but she actually had it out on Christmas day this year.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

product_meta.title: Nerf Rebelle Phoenix Heartbreaker Bow
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard Packaging


Put your target on notice with the Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow. Show your poise and power as you unleash your skills and aim with attitude. Feel the thrill of real bow action as you launch the far-reaching darts and make your mark on the world. Just go easy on your target.

 This Nerf Rebelle bow fires five foam darts up to 75 feet for far-reaching fun. Build your bow-blasting skills and reveal your Nerf Rebelle attitude. Take aim with the Heartbreaker Bow blaster and show the world the beauty of strength and power. Arm yourself for action and team up with friends to play together as you make the rules and define the style. With the Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow, real bow action is at your fingertips!

Experience real bow action with the Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow.View larger The Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow is decorated with pink and purple phoenix feathers for a fierce and feminine look that's just right for glamorous Nerf Rebelle girls like you.View larger It's time to step up and stand out with the Nerf Rebelle Heartbreaker Bow.View larger Real bow action.View larger Five collectible darts and dart storage.View larger Step up and stand out.View larger Hasbro is committed to being an ethical and responsible company and is a recognized toy industry leader in the areas of product safety, environmental sustainability, ethical sourcing and philanthropy. 

FEATURES:
 * Fire darts up to 75 feet
 * Includes five collectible darts
 * Dart storage accessory holds five darts and fits on accessory rail
 * Accessory rail works with Nerf Rebelle Mission Central App Rail Mount and other accessories (sold separately)
 * Ages 8 and up
 * Includes Heartbreaker Bow, five darts, dart storage accessory, and instructions
feature_bullets: Blasters and accessories designed especially for girls
Fun, feminine deco on every piece
Finally, a line of blasters made just for you
